Nhdc12832 Class Reference

Class for the New Haven Display 128x32 LCD. More...

#include <Nhdc12832.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for Nhdc12832:

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of the MLcd abstract class using the New Haven Display 128x32 pixel LCD. It is controlled using the SPI bus, CS line, A0 line, and Reset line.

See the ExpLcdDevice for an example.
